subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} [[fellow]]s; [[associate]]s; [[company]]; [[companion]]
# {{†}} to make (two people) [[become]] a [[pair]]; to make people [[marry]]
# {{†}} [[together]]; with [[each other]]
# {{lb|zh|Wu}} [[all]]; [[both]]; [[completely]]
